mistral:7b-instruct: The Australian Unity Health EPO plan fits your profile due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization related to your listed conditions (hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, stroke), outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care. Additionally, with a monthly premium of $300, this plan offers an affordable balance for your middle-income bracket while providing up to $500,000 in coverage, ensuring substantial financial protection against potential high medical bills, such as those associated with your conditions.
